0: The key insight is that cubic style sculptures can be captured by the as rigid as possible energy with a regularization on rotated surface normals. We present a 3D stylization algorithm that can turn an input shape into the style of a cube while maintaining the content of the original shape.
1: The key insight is that cubic style sculptures can be captured by the as rigid as possible energy with a regularization on rotated surface normals. We present a 3D stylization algorithm that can turn an input shape into the style of a cube while maintaining the content of the original shape.
